duties_responsibilities.duty: Performs routine and specialized testing and procedures with appropriate supervision.
Operates a variety of laboratory instruments and performs quality control procedures.
Oversees the work of other personnel and trains employees in day-to-day procedures.
Inoculates, cultivates, classifies, and identifies microorganisms found in bodily fluids, exudates, and surgical specimens.
Performs chemical and immunological tests to identify substances found in blood and other body fluids.
Consults with medical staff and other health care providers on laboratory services.
Enters and retrieves data from established computer files.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Medical Technology or a related science
